org.apache.commons.math4.linear

Class RealVectorAbstractTest.RealVectorTestImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.math4.linear.RealVector
      • org.apache.commons.math4.linear.RealVectorAbstractTest.RealVectorTestImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    RealVectorAbstractTest

    public static class RealVectorAbstractTest.RealVectorTestImpl
extends RealVector
implements java.io.Serializable
    Minimal implementation of the RealVector abstract class, for mixed types unit tests.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
